**2023-07-05 / @aclements, @adonovan, @bradfitz, @rsc**

**Discussions (not yet proposals)**

- **codereview: should the Go project stop importing GitHub PRs?** [#61182](https://go.dev/issue/61182)
- **math/rand/v2: a new API for math/rand and a first v2 for std** [#60751](https://go.dev/issue/60751)
- **net/http: add methods and path variables to ServeMux patterns** [#60227](https://go.dev/issue/60227)
- **net/http: move HTTP/2 into the standard library** [#60746](https://go.dev/issue/60746)

**Accepted**

- **cmd/go: add global ignore mechanism for Go tooling ecosystem** [#42965](https://go.dev/issue/42965)
  - no change in consensus; **accepted** üéâ
- **cmd/go: go test -fullpath should include full paths for build errors too** [#60451](https://go.dev/issue/60451)
  - no change in consensus; **accepted** üéâ
- **cmd/go: preserve basic GOPATH mode indefinitely** [#60915](https://go.dev/issue/60915)
  - no change in consensus; **accepted** üéâ
- **cmd/vet:  add a new analyzer  for check missing values after append** [#60448](https://go.dev/issue/60448)
  - no change in consensus; **accepted** üéâ
- **runtime/metrics: add goroutine state counts, total goroutines created, total threads** [#15490](https://go.dev/issue/15490)
  - no change in consensus; **accepted** üéâ

**Declined**

- **cmd/go: mod init: option to infer module name from git origin** [#60635](https://go.dev/issue/60635)
  - no change in consensus; **declined**
- **start using semantic versions for Go releases** [#32450](https://go.dev/issue/32450)
  - no change in consensus; **declined**
- **unsafe: add Unreachable** [#30582](https://go.dev/issue/30582)
  - no change in consensus; **declined**

  - **likely accept**; last call for comments ‚è≥

  - **likely accept**; last call for comments ‚è≥

  - **likely accept**; last call for comments ‚è≥

  - **likely accept**; last call for comments ‚è≥
- **x/tools/go/analysis: add Config.GoVersion field** [#61176](https://go.dev/issue/61176)
  - **likely accept**; last call for comments ‚è≥

- **hash: make the Sum method less confusing** [#21070](https://go.dev/issue/21070)
  - **likely decline**; last call for comments ‚è≥
- **io: require io.Reader to return either n > 0 or an error** [#27531](https://go.dev/issue/27531)
  - **likely decline**; last call for comments ‚è≥
- **sync: remove the Cond type** [#21165](https://go.dev/issue/21165)
  - **likely decline**; last call for comments ‚è≥
